channel.title: Projects on Mario RO | Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mario RO | Personal Page

item.title: Chest X-ray Diseases Detector
item.description: This project presents a work plan and information from literature records on the development of a system to support the detection of identifiable medical conditions from chest radiographs.

item.title: Simulation of Attacks on Fuzzy Vault Fingerprint-based Scheme
item.description: Throughout this social service program, an extensive bibliographic review of the functioning of biometric systems used in conjunction with cryptographic systems to protect information was carried out.

item.title: Diffuse watering of plants
item.description: This project contains a proposal for the implementation of a fuzzy control system as an automatic method of regulation and control for the care of an ornamental plant.

item.title: Intelligent Traffic Light with Rosenblatt Perceptron
item.description: This project was carried out to build from its most basic form the elementary calculation unit of neural networks known as perceptron.

item.title: WineBot
item.description: In this project we are building an expert system capable of giving recommendations about wines taking into account the occasion for which it is going to be used, the type of food it is going to be served with and the user’s tastes in terms of aromas and flavors.

item.title: Implementing Ask Behavior and OpenPose in the Golem Service Robot
item.description: The Golem-III project is a service robot presented internationally at RoboCup 2016 Leipzig, Germany, where the 6th place was obtained in the category @Home.
